title: Apify Actor Input
description: Schema for the input of an Apify Actor

hashtags.description: Type in the hashtag with or without # symbol - the scraper will get the data either way. Use the + Add button to add more hashtags.

resultsLimit.description: If you set this to 5, you will scrape 5 posts for each hashtag you provide. With this setup, if you decide to provide 7 different hashtags, you will scrape 35 posts altogether.
